nodes.text: Jotaz were a species of large and aggressive predators found on the planet Zeffo. With a thick hide and strong forearms, the jotaz used brute strength to overwhelm their enemies. Cal Kestis discovered and killed a rabid member of the species while exploring a crashed Venator-class Star Destroyer.
Jotaz first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. Jotaz was the first creature Respawn Entertainment designed for the game.
